False Faces Masks

Commedia dell’Arte

Pantalone, Zanni, Arlecchino and more — masks rooted in the Italian tradition of comic archetypes.

Pedagogical

Neutral, larval, and training masks for teaching physical theatre and mask work.

Festival

Mawk masks, Dorset Ooser, and other creations for street theatre, ritual, and celebration.

Other

Contemporary experiments, 3D-printed forms, hybrids, and masks that don’t fit neatly elsewhere.

Unseen Things, Lyndhurst, England, United Kingdom - james@unseenthings.co.uk
